name: Summon Erodaemon
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Horsemen of the Apocalypse: Book of the Damned, Vol. 3 © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, F (a bent or tarnished wedding band)
text: This spell functions like summon monster, except it summons a single erodaemon.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材(一枚弯曲或是被玷污的结婚戒指)
text_zh: 本法术的效果和召唤怪物一样，除了本法术召唤的是一只离间邪魔。
